review: I will have to say this is one of the best portable streaming devices on the market. You can watch a lot of the most popular apps used on IOS or Android operation systems, I used this with my iphone and it works fantastic. The chromecast does need to be connected via HDMI and USB, HDMI for audio and video and USB for power. Most newer TV's do come with a usb port which makes life easier instead of using the power dongle you need to run to a plug.The reason for not giving it 5 stars*The chromecast will take a while to detect on my phone so I would have to wait for the app to bring up the casting icon and if that doesn't work I would have to close the app and reopen it.*Hate that it doesn't have an actual remote, I don't like that I have to get my phone every time I want to change the TV show I'm watching or when I want to watch a different movie.Other then that this works really well and I bet it will work better for android devices because you can mirror cast which is awesome.
